name: Gillette Blue 2 Plus Razor
description: Gillette Blue II Plus Disposable Razors provide five extra lubricants for a smoother and closer shave. With comfort blades specially formulated to feel comfortable against your face, Gillette Disposable Razors leave you looking and feeling fresh. Offering the closest and most comfortable shave without the need for shaving foam, your skin will feel less irritated and less uncomfortable straight after your shave.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
